attributes.action: Reject the proposal to build a new four-lane highway in the vicinity of the Stonehenge World Heritage Site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Prime Minister to step in and completely reject the plans proposed by the Highways Agency to build a four lane motorway in the vicinity of Stonehenge.  This is a world heritage site and to go forward with any form of road building plan in this area will destroy the area from a historical/archaeological point of view and from a spiritual aspect.
